mainApp.title: Junk News Aggregator
mainApp.homeDescription: This site shows Junk news stories posted on Facebook. The term “junk news” is defined in our methodology.

top10MiniApp.title: Junk News Aggregator - Top 10
top10MiniApp.description: This site shows the top 10 Junk news stories posted on Facebook in the last 24 hours, updated once a day at 5pm ET. The term “junk news” is defined in our methodology. This is a mini version of the full Junk News Aggregator, available here
